Title: AJAX Fax document viewer
Description: The AJAX Fax document viewer is an ASP.net 4.0 project which uses a Seadragon control to display Tiff/Tif files inside the browser. Since it's based on Javascript there's no need for plugins like Adobe Flash & Microsoft Silverlight
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The AJAX Fax document viewer is an ASP.net 4.0 project which uses a Seadragon control to display Tiff/Tif files inside the browser. Since it's based on Javascript there's no need for plugins like Adobe Flash & Microsoft Silverlight


Additional information is available inside the README.txt file =)
